name: Mailgo
title: mailgo.ai
shortDescription: Mailgo leverages AI to enhance cold email campaigns with high deliverability. It's designed for businesses looking to scale their outreach efforts efficiently. The AI agent identifies ideal leads, automates follow-ups, and integrates seamlessly with existing CRMs. An example use case is a tech startup using Mailgo to increase demo bookings by automating lead generation and email outreach.
cons: May not support all email providers
Potential privacy concerns with AI usage

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: ActiveCampaign
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Strong in automation and CRM features
